Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • Order

  • public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
    The Order class contains the details of an order for an EspressoStand.
    Version:
    11/10/11
    Author:
    Chun-Wei Chen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Order()
      The constructor with no parameter constructs a new order for a "Combo #1", which cosists of one single short latte and one cookie.
      Order(int combo1Count, int combo2Count)
      The constructor with two parameters constructs a new order made up of combos.
      Order(int singleShortCount, int doubleShortCount, int doubleTallCount, int cookieCount)
      The constructor with four parameters constructs a new order made up of single short lattes, double short lattes, double tall lattes and cookies.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCookieCount()
      Get the quantity of cookies in the order.
      int getDoubleShortCount()
      Get the quantity of double short lattes in the order.
      int getDoubleTallCount()
      Get the quantity of double tall lattes in the order.
      int getSingleShortCount()
      Get the quantity of single short lattes in the order.
      java.lang.String toString()
      The String version of the order.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Order

        public Order()
        The constructor with no parameter constructs a new order for a "Combo #1", which cosists of one single short latte and one cookie.

      • Order

        public Order(int combo1Count,
     int combo2Count)
        The constructor with two parameters constructs a new order made up of combos. Each "Combo #1" (the first parameter) cosists of one single short latte and one cookie. Each "Combo #2" (the second parameter) cosists of one double tall latte and two cookies. Both quantities in the order must be >= 0.
        Parameters:
        combo1Count - the quantity of "Combo #1" servings
        combo2Count - the quantity of "Combo #2" servings
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if combo1Count < 0 or combo2Count < 0

      • Order

        public Order(int singleShortCount,
     int doubleShortCount,
     int doubleTallCount,
     int cookieCount)
        The constructor with four parameters constructs a new order made up of single short lattes, double short lattes, double tall lattes and cookies. All the quantities in the order must be >= 0.
        Parameters:
        singleShortCount - the quantity of single short lattes in the order
        doubleShortCount - the quantity of double short lattes in the order
        doubleTallCount - the quantity of double tall lattes in the order
        cookieCount - the quantity of cookies in the order
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if singleShortCount < 0 or doubleShortCount < 0 or doubleTallCount < 0 or cookieCount < 0
